creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstracted image of a standing nude woman with PL leg raised and knee bent, made of arcing lines; white lines, rust-brown ground (slightly darker than 2013.29.513)
marks:
Signature, Title, and Date

 Signed LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [No.12]; L
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: No. 12
